verses.verse: Wisdom <S%H2454><s%> hath <S%H1129>builded<s%> her <S%H1004>house<s%>; She hath hewn <S%H2672>out<s%> her <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H5982>pillars<s%>:
She hath <S%H2873>killed<s%> her <S%H2874>beasts<s%>; She hath <S%H4537>mingled<s%> her <S%H3196>wine<s%>; She hath also <S%H6186>furnished<s%> her <S%H7979>table<s%>:
She hath sent <S%H7971>forth<s%> her <S%H5291>maidens<s%>; She <S%H7121>crieth<s%> <S%H1610>upon<s%> the highest <S%H4791>places<s%> of the <S%H7176>city<s%>:
Whoso is <S%H6612>simple<s%>, let him turn <S%H5493>in<s%> <S%H2638>hither<s%>: As for him that is void of <S%H3820>understanding<s%>, she saith to <S%H559>him<s%>,
Come <S%H3212><s%>, <S%H3898>eat<s%> ye of my <S%H3899>bread<s%>, And <S%H8354>drink<s%> of the <S%H3196>wine<s%> which I have <S%H4537>mingled<s%>.
Leave <S%H5800><s%> <S%H6612>off<s%>, ye simple <S%H2421>ones<s%>, and live; And <S%H833>walk<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H998>understanding<s%>.

He that <S%H3256>correcteth<s%> a <S%H3887>scoffer<s%> <S%H3947>getteth<s%> to himself <S%H7036>reviling<s%>; And he that <S%H3198>reproveth<s%> a <S%H7563>wicked<s%> man getteth himself a <S%H3971>blot<s%>.
Reprove <S%H3198><s%> not a <S%H3887>scoffer<s%>, lest he <S%H8130>hate<s%> <S%H3198>thee<s%>: Reprove a wise <S%H2450>man<s%>, and he will love <S%H157>thee<s%>.

Give <S%H5414><s%> instruction to a <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H2449>man<s%>, and he will be yet wiser: <S%H3045>Teach<s%> a <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H3254>man<s%>, and he will increase in <S%H3948>learning<s%>.
The <S%H3374>fear<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> is the <S%H8462>beginning<s%> of <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>; And the <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> of the <S%H6918>Holy<s%> One is <S%H998>understanding<s%>.
For by me thy <S%H3117>days<s%> shall be <S%H7235>multiplied<s%>, And the <S%H8141>years<s%> of thy <S%H2416>life<s%> shall be <S%H3254>increased<s%>.
If thou art <S%H2449>wise<s%>, thou art <S%H2449>wise<s%> for <S%H3887>thyself<s%>; And if thou scoffest, thou alone shalt bear <S%H5375>it<s%>.
And she <S%H3427>sitteth<s%> at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of her <S%H1004>house<s%>, On a <S%H3678>seat<s%> in the high <S%H4791>places<s%> of the <S%H7176>city<s%>,
To <S%H7121>call<s%> to them that <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H3474>by<s%>, Who go right on their <S%H734>ways<s%>:
Whoso is <S%H6612>simple<s%>, let him turn <S%H5493>in<s%> <S%H2638>hither<s%>; And as for him that is void of <S%H3820>understanding<s%>, she saith to <S%H559>him<s%>,
Stolen <S%H1589><s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%> are <S%H4985>sweet<s%>, And <S%H3899>bread<s%> eaten in <S%H5643>secret<s%> is <S%H5276>pleasant<s%>.
But he <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> not that the <S%H7496>dead<s%> are <S%H7121>there<s%>; That her guests are in the <S%H6012>depths<s%> of <S%H7585>Sheol<s%>.
